availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Grayson Springs, Grayson County, KY. A Kentucky-born farmer, son of James Higdon and Elizabeth Vinson. Married Mary Harriet Higdon. Father of Rosetta Higdon, Leonard M. Higdon, James Dent Higdon, Juletta Higdon, Augustine D. Higdon, Zachery E. Higdon, Matthias T. Higdon, Teresa Elizabeth Higdon, and Julian Bamberry Higdon.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Grayson Springs post office, p. 12.

Find A Grave, Entry for Thomas Higdon (1807-1871), Find A Grave Memorial # 63604036, Saint Augustine Cemetery, Clarkson, Grayson County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=higdon&GSfn=thomas&GSbyrel=in&GSdy=1871&GSdyrel=in&GSob=n&GRid=63604036&df=all& (accessed 28 June 2017).
